desc.html: View of the River Ilissos and the Stadion Bridge, circa 1900. Taken from the Stadium. Note the Rotunda, constructed 1896 and demolished 1915. It housed a panorama of the 1870 Siege of Paris, for popular entertainment.

wiki.Credit: anonymous postcard, personal collection of Martin Baldwin-Edwards. Enhanced digital version from http://www.flickr.com/photos/athens_greece/7090922841/
wiki.Permission: Original postcard is in the public domain ({{PD-US-1923}}). Digital enhanced version released under cc-by-sa.
